casebody.data:
IN RE: Olander R. BYNUM 109P17-5 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 14, 2018 Olander R. Bynum, for Bynum, Olander R. Joseph Finarelli, Special Deputy Attorney General, Ben R. David, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 25th of May 2018 by Petitioner for En Banc Consideration of Application for Writ of Mandamus:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 14th of August 2018."
